name: Re:Connect
description:
An asymmetrical multiplayer game made using PUN2 and unity 3D HDRP

In Re:Connect, you play either as employees of the dark robot company that uses handguns or as the brave girl who fights against them. The employees are superior in number but are limited by the "internet" signal, meaning that they have to stay near their robot boss.

*Requires 5 people to play (once 5 people enter the random matchmaking, you will automatically proceed to character selection)

*Due to the high quality graphics, the game may not run in some older devices

Controls:

AWSD - move

Left Click - Slash/Shoot

Right Click - Block/Shield

Shift - Dash

Space - Jump

E/Q - skills for the girl (Q is only available if you have enough energy, which is gained by blocking the enemy bullets)

Credits:

Charles Mao - Artist

Grant Lee - Programmer

* Every piece of art and script, including shaders, animations, rigging, etc. was made from scratch over the jam period.

* The only non-unity assets we used were node canvas and cyber background music from the asset store.

Note:

As this is a game jam and I am a very art-intensive person, there are still numerous bugs in the current build that could break the game experience.

Icebox Features (maybe next patch?):

revive + different employee identities

Evil Girl
